text: The value that @Netlify offers in their free offering for personal sites is insane.

text: @Netlify I love you. Thanks for giving us the best #staticsite hosting in the world!

text: I think people sometimes underestimate how awesome @Netlify is

text: Just your weekly praise to @Netlify for being amazing and making things the easiest they ever were. It's been a minute. https://t.co/CxkYziiUmC

text: Think I'm falling in love with @Netlify. I'm looking around my github for any tiniest web project that I could build a pipeline for.

text: I have just setup a new @Netlify site from my phone. Such an amazing service ❤️

text: #Netlify is such a boss! Have auto deploys on push to branch AND auto preview deploys for pull requests. Smooth as butter!

text:
My experience with @Netlify has beaten any developer product I've used.
If you haven't tried it yet, give it a go for free! 

https://t.co/hBdTpaTlXS

text: How can one live without @Netlify 😍
name: Wassim Chegham

text: As a dev-ops plebian, using @Netlify services is a godsend to me. The ability for me to host built content just by clicking buttons and be done in a matter of minutes is just mindblowing.
name: Kenny Reida D.

text: deployment on @Netlify has been a absolute dream. I love the webhook based rebuild. Let's me make a static site with dynamic data
name: Stephen Solka

text: I need to say this... (sorry non dev folk) @Netlify you make my work so joyful with how easy it is to use thank you!
name: Hannah Goodridge

text: I know I’ve said this before... but @Netlify is a fantastic service. Honestly, platform docs and support ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

text: I love you, @Netlify. You're everything a deployment- and hosting platform should be and more. https://t.co/sttpIJK6cm
name: Luc Princen

text: @KrauseFx Moved to Jekyll with @Netlify and I’ve loved every single second of it!
name: Jordan Morgan

text: Netlify is absolutely amazing. Connecting it to GitHub repositories is super easy, and deploys are blazing fast. I am currently moving all my static sites there and will be able to shut down my VPS.
name: Nat Buckley

text: Sending some ❤️ to the @Netlify team. I could not get HTTPS working for my  GitHub pages due to my limited knowledge about configuring DNS etc. So I imported the repo to Netlify and thanks to their amazing documentation I got it to work. #netlifylove
name: June

text: I'm blown away with @netlify just picked up my repo and deployed. Make me think CICD is so ...last year, and Continuous Integration Deployment (CID) is really the next phase.  #DevOps
name: 阮 添 福

text:
Deploy previews from @Netlify are one of the best quality-of-life improvements I've had on frontend projects in SUCH a long time. Every PR for @getfrontendjobs gets its own deployed version, and I can be confident how things will _actually_ look in prod.

https://t.co/S4tYcxWWf6
name: @signalnerve

text: It's ridiculous how much @Netlify has sped up my workflow. 😎

text: @Netlify appreciation tweet. Such an awesome platform.

text: I've been extremely impressed by @Netlify after spending the past week deploying all the things. Choose a repo, paste a build command, and you have a blazing fast https site in seconds. We're definitely considering moving all the @directus static sites over!

text: Everything about @Netlify just feels right. They make stuff so easy. Can't recommend them enough!

text: Netlify. Webhooks. 🤩 @Netlify is another level of awesome 👏🏻

text: New hobby: moving Jekyll sites to @Netlify and wondering what the catch is. It’s exactly what I hoped it would be.

text: Really loving my @airtable, @gatsbyjs and @Netlify setup I have going on for https://t.co/si5BHq4Abd 😊. As a solopreneur, I needed something easy to maintain and it's been great.

text: I just did my first @Netlify deploy, by far it is the best tool I've ever used for deployments. It took less than 5 minutes to get it configured, deployed, and available on a public domain 😍 https://t.co/3qO4eXeuEI

text: Oh @Netlify - where have you been all my life? Loving all the free time I have now that I’m not maintaining web servers, build servers, Wordpress installs, etc etc..

text: @Netlify Just wanted to pop by and say that split testing different types of site by pushing them as different git branches is the sexiest thing ever 😍

text: @Netlify Thanks For Saving My Ass And Making My Code Run Smoothly On The Server I Really Love You Guys So Much . If You Haven't Heard Of @Netlify Omo Your Missing Out Seriously @unicodeveloper @codebeast @wesbos check It Out at https://t.co/HI4v199wLD
name: Adenekan #BellzaHQ 🔥

text:
😰 CSS Scan landing page was having huge downtimes on Github Pages.

➡️ Moved it to @Netlify in 5 min. and sales went +25% up in a week! 🔥

🥰 Custom domain support, SSL, and super easy UX.
📡 Also syncs with the Github repo and deploys automatically!
🙌 Strongly recommend!
name: Guilherme Rizzo

text: @Netlify @github Sweet Jesus, I love Netlify.
name: Ryan Watters

text: Why didn't anyone tell me how dope @Netlify is..... damn i love this.

text: I could not be more pleased with @Netlify as a static site host. It was a dream to deploy a new jekyll / webpack site there. Everything about the workflow and tooling is so polished and well thought through.

text: I haven't found a reason NOT to love @Netlify ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️, my dev workflow is on NOS 🚀🚀🚀🚀🚀 https://t.co/KeivpaETFt

text: I’m a big fan of @Netlify for all their dev friendly hosting goodness. But here’s what really sets them apart: I can email support and a real, friendly, helpful human replies quickly. 👍
